channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Cracks are forming in Meta’s partnership with Scale AI
item.description: Two months after making a $14.3B investment in Scale AI, Meta is relying heavily on its competitors to train next generation AI models.

item.title: 41 Best Labor Day Sales on WIRED-Tested Gear (2025)
item.description: You labored hard for your cash—save some of it with these Labor Day deals on WIRED-approved fire pits, laptops, pizza ovens, and more.

item.title: Spotlight on AI at TechCrunch Disrupt: Don’t miss these sessions backed by JetBrains and Greenfield
item.description: TechCrunch Disrupt isn’t just about showcasing the startups of tomorrow — it’s also about surfacing the boldest ideas shaping technology today.

item.title: The Best Kindle of 2025: Paperwhite, Scribe, or Colorsoft?
item.description: Here’s how Amazon’s ebook readers stack up—and which one might be right for you.

item.title: TikTok now lets users send voice notes and images in DMs
item.description: The new capabilities bring TikTok’s messaging experience more in line with that of other popular social apps and services.

item.title: Uber and Lyft drivers in California win a path to unionization
item.description: The agreement creates a model for drivers to be able to organize for increased pay, job protections, and other benefits. In exchange, California regul...

item.title: The Best Google Pixel Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed: Which Model to Buy, Cases and Accessories, Feature Drops
item.description: Here’s a guide to all the models—plus Pixel case recommendations and smart software tricks to try.

item.title: FEMA’s Chaotic Summer Has Gone From Bad to Worse
item.description: Following a week of strife at the disaster relief agency, Homeland Security secretary Kristi Noem told FEMA employees to “be vocal” about their positi...

item.title: Tesla challenges $243 million verdict in Autopilot death trial
item.description: The company's lawyers blame the driver (who settled with the victims separately) for the crash, and the plaintiffs' lawyers for "overwhelming" the jur...

item.title: SSA Whistleblower’s Resignation Email Mysteriously Disappeared From Inboxes
item.description: Less than 30 minutes after the Social Security Administration’s chief data officer resigned following a whistleblower complaint, recipients could no l...
